class.name: AudioEffectRecord
class.brief_description: Audio effect used for recording the sound from an audio bus.
class.description: Allows the user to record the sound from an audio bus. This can include all audio output by Godot when used on the "Master" audio bus. Can be used (with an [AudioStreamMicrophone]) to record from a microphone. It sets and gets the format in which the audio file will be recorded (8-bit, 16-bit, or compressed). It checks whether or not the recording is active, and if it is, records the sound. It then returns the recorded sample.

method.name: is_recording_active
method.description: Returns whether the recording is active or not.

method.name: set_recording_active
method.description: If [code]true[/code], the sound will be recorded. Note that restarting the recording will remove the previously recorded sample.

members.member: Specifies the format in which the sample will be recorded. See [enum AudioStreamSample.Format] for available formats.
